Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh. Guess not, then.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's a big rumor spreading around the
Stable Association, of something I think
might be a <clr:0000>new animal species<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It sounds big and brutal like a bear—and
kind of tusky like a rhino. But rumor is
that it's not a bear OR a rhino.
I think it's a lot more than just a rumor
though. There's an actual <clr:0000>picture of the
animal's footprints<clr:ffff> at one stable!
If you see anything like a <clr:0000>new animal
species<clr:ffff> in your travels, please, please,
please let me know!
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm? Your pouch is full.


I was going to thank you with a fresh
<clr:0000>endura carrot<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>How about you free up some space and
we try this again?
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, traveler! If you're striking up
conversation with me again...

Does that mean you've seen something
like a <clr:0000>new animal species<clr:ffff>? Please, tell me
if you know anything!
Talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm? Your pouch is still full.


That's OK. Just come talk to me when
there's room for this <clr:0000>endura carrot<clr:ffff>!
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh. Guess not, then.<sp:0:4:0>I'm sure you'd remember if you saw a
giant bear-rhino-looking thing that isn't
a bear OR a rhino.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>Might sound like a half-baked rumor...<sp:5:1:0>
But it's real! I know it is!

There's one stable that even has a <clr:0000>picture
of its footprints<clr:ffff>!

If you see anything like a <clr:0000>new animal
species<clr:ffff>, please, please, please let me
know right away!
Talk_2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice>Hey! Made some room? <sp:5:0:0>Then here
you go!
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Sorry... I came on too strong again,
didn't I?
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hello there. <sp:5:0:0>Going by your clothes,<sp:5:1:0>
I take it you're not a member of the
survey team.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're a traveler, aren't you?


Have you, by chance, seen anything like
a <clr:0000>new animal species <clr:ffff>on your travels?
Please tell me you have!
Talk_1005: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Sorry... I came on too strong, didn't I?
Talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>No kidding... "Dondons," huh?
Princess Zelda was studying them
at Lakeside Stable?
<sp:3:0:2:0401>That's...<sp:5:1:0> That's...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0800>Amazing! The rumor that everyone was
talking about turned out to be real!
A <clr:0000>new species of animal<clr:ffff>!
I know what I'm gonna do during my next
break—take a trip to Lakeside Stable to
visit those Dondons.
Thanks, buddy!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Here's a little something for you.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Truth be told, I wasn't at all sure that
there was anything to the rumor, but it
was exciting to think about.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But what do you know, Dondons really
do exist! And I have to say, these animals
sound pretty interesting.
I think I'll go to Lakeside Stable during
my next break. I want to see some of
these creatures for myself!
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I don't mean to be rude, but can we talk
somewhere dry?
near00: I'll wait until the rain stops.
